mapper.insert: insert into ram(id, code, productCode, productName, productCompany, productSort, memoryCapacity, clock, voltage, productDate, regDate, price, count, filename, filesize) values(0, #{code}, #{productCode}, #{productName},#{productCompany},#{productSort},#{memoryCapacity},#{clock} ,#{voltage},#{productDate},curdate(),#{price},#{count}, #{filename},#{filesize})
mapper.update: update ram set readcount = readcount + 1 where id = #{id}
